taxon.distribution: Cameroon, DR Congo, Angola, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Namibia, Eswatini, South Africa

referenceObject.reference: Blackwall, J. (1866). A list of spiders captured in the south-east region of equatorial Africa, with descriptions of such species as appear to be new to arachnologists. Annals and Magazine of Natural History (3) 18(108): 451-468.
